casebody.data:
Third Department,

June, 1954.

(June 18, 1954.) John J. Amodeo et al., Appellants, v. Eugene Giacoma et al., Respondents. Eugene Giacoma, Respondent, v. John J. Amodeo, Appellant.

Motion to dismiss appeals granted, by default, without costs. Present — Foster, P. J., Bergan, Coon, Halpern and Imrie, JJ.
